messages.title: A HUNG PARLIAMENT WOULD MEAN 5 MORE YEARS OF LABOUR.
messages.content: Brown to stay as PM in hung parliament. Britain needs energy and leadership. The only way to make sure we don’t have 5 more years of Labour is to vote Conservative.

messages.title: The choice at this election:
messages.content: 5 more years of Labour or Change with the Conservatives. The Conservatives must win here to stop another 5 years of Labour.

messages.title: PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM DAVID CAMERON
messages.content: Britain votes in the most important election for a generation. There are only two outcomes: Five more years of this tired Labour government or a change with the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ross shares public support for British Armed Forces especially Royal Legion plans to help with jobs and recovery from physical and mental injuries.
Ross believes that environmental groups must work in partnership with local businesses and the council to achieve real environmental change.

issues.environment: Ross believes that environmental groups must work in partnership with local businesses and the council to achieve real environmental change.

quotes.text: I know that we need a fresh and younger perspective in parliament, someone who can really stand up for what matters to you. That's what I want to do for you in Gordon.

images.caption: ROSS THOMSON - A RECORD OF ACTION
